title: Train Sim World PC Editor (Beta)
description: The Train Sim World PC Editor (Beta) brings to you the power of our own developer toolset. Learn how to create gameplay for existing content, as well as developing all-new routes and locomotives for use in Train Sim World 4 on PC-exclusive platforms.
longDescription:
**To use the Train Sim World PC Editor (Beta) you must own Train Sim World 4 on PC-exclusive platforms. **

The Train Sim World PC Editor (Beta) brings to you the power of our own developer toolset. Learn how to create gameplay for existing content, as well as developing all-new routes and locomotives for use in Train Sim World. With the full capabilities of Unreal Engine 4 available to you, your creativity and skill is the limit.  

# What can you do with the Train Sim World PC Editor (Beta)? 

- Create new gameplay for existing routes and locomotives, this includes new scenarios and timetables 
- Create certain mods for existing content 
- Create routes from scratch, use landscaping tools to import terrain data, lay track and markers, populated with custom scenery 
- Create new gameplay on your own routes 
- Import models and rail vehicles made from scratch and set them up as usable and playable assets within the simulator 
- Test your content by playing it in the editor 

# How does this differ from Creators Club? 

Creators Club within Train Sim World is an accessible way of making and sharing content for all platforms, using the in-game livery designer and scenario planner functionality. The full PC Editor is naturally PC only, and resembles the tools used by our own studio to develop brand new content for Train Sim World. 

The Train Sim World PC Editor is currently in Beta and will receive updates over time to iron out issues and improve the user experience and functionality. We will be providing periodic tutorials, documentation and livestream guides to show examples of how you can get started on various aspects of Train Sim World development. 

# We hope you have as much fun making content for Train Sim World as we do!
